mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.USERNAME , A.PASSWORD , A.ROLE_TYPE , B.RANDOM_ID FROM ACCOUNT A LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCOUNT_MY_PAGE B ON A.USERNAME = B.USERNAME AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.PAGE_DESCRIPTION = 'MAIN' WHERE A.USERNAME = #{userId} AND A.PASSWORD IS NOT NULL
SELECT A.ID , A.USERNAME , A.ROLE_TYPE FROM ACCOUNT A WHERE A.USERNAME = #{userId}
SELECT ID, ROLE_TYPE, ROLE_DESC, IS_EXPRESSION, USE_YN FROM ROLE WHERE ID = #{id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT RESOURCE_NAME , ROLE_TYPE FROM RESOURCES A JOIN ROLE_RESOURCES B ON A.ID = B.RESOURCE_ID JOIN ROLE C ON B.ROLE_ID = C.ID WHERE C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT A.ID , A.ROLE_TYPE , B.ID AS PARENT_ID , B.ROLE_TYPE AS PARENT_TYPE FROM ROLE_HIERARCHY A LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLE_HIERARCHY B ON A.PARENT_ID = B.ID
